metadata.name: HackTool - Inveigh Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of Inveigh a cross-platform .NET IPv4/IPv6 machine-in-the-middle tool

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\inveigh.exe')) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('\\inveigh\.exe', '\\inveigh\.dll')) AND lower(device.desc) = lower('inveigh') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -spooferip')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -replytoips ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -replytodomains ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -replytomacs ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -snifferip'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of Inveigh a cross-platform .NET IPv4/IPv6 machine-in-the-middle tool
